titleStmt.title: VVit and vvealth contending for preheminence: in a different dialogue between Wat Witty-pole and Davy Rich.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T.B. at the sign of the Maiden-head, neare Holborn Conduit,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Epigram on title page: You who have wit, or wealth (or both) to looke, are wish't (impartially) upon this booke.

place.placeName: the sign of the Maiden-head, neare Holborn Conduit
